cause.description:
This group is to help raise money and awareness for Pancreatic Cancer. With the money raised we will be one step closer to finding a cure. This group is dedicated to all those affected by this disease. please visit: http://www.pancan.org/ for more information. This cause is really to honor my Grandfather, who lost his battle in August 2007. we love you Nonno.
1. Raise money to find a cure.
2. Raise awareness of this disease.
3. Honor all those affected.
cause.mission: Help raise money to find a cure for Pancreatic Cancer.
cause.name: PanCan
